title: kOrudhu nAmadhi
sahitya:
kOrudu nAmadi anishamu gunadaru nirguNu krishNuni
nArAyanu vishvambaru navanIta ha..ru..Ni..




caraNam 1



kundali manimaya bhooshanu kuvalaya daLa varnANguni
andajapathi vAhanuni akaNita bhava haruNi
maNdala chOdaka damanuni mAlAlangrutha vakshuni
niNdu krupampudi chandruni nityAnan..du..ni..




caraNam 2



Agama pooja padArtuni Abatyaka samboortuni
NAgEndrayata talpuni nana kalpuni
Saga brahma mayAtyuni sansada gAna vilOluni
VAgeshwara samsthOrtuni vaikuNdotha..mu..ni..




caraNam 3



kumkuma vasanta kAtmuni gOpAngana kusalIptuni
shankara satimani nUduni sarvAtmuni samuni
shankaninAda mrudanguni chakrAyuda vidIptuni
vEnkatagiri nijavAsuni vibhava vidAya..ku..ni
